segments.text: I watch the water spill over the sink, pooling dangerously on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a sense of impending disaster lurking in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so absorbed in her task, it’s almost surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about the mess that will ensue when the stool tips or someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outdoor scene and this chaos is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only hope that nothing bad happens today; it feels inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The smell of cookies fills the air, adding to the domestic bliss.
segments.speaker: PAR
